subject: Dear Mr. xxx,
body:
Dear Mr. xxx,
How are you doing today? I hope well, I have been waiting to hear from you to no avail, kindly respond to my emails so that we can proceed with the business transaction and conclude successfully at the earliest convenience.
There is no single time to waste considering the time frame given to conclude this transaction, act swiftly so that we can proceed and conclude successfully.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Have a nice day.
Best regards
Barr. Gilbert Howard (ESQ)
Gilbert Howard LLP

subject: Re: Dear Mr. xxx,
body:
Hello Mr. Gilbert Howard,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm doing quite alright, thank you for asking. I apologize if my response has been delayed, I've been a bit preoccupied lately.

Regarding the business matter you mentioned, could you please provide me with more details? What exactly is it about and what would be my role in it? 

Looking forward to your response.

Have a great day!

Best wishes,
Leila

subject: Re: Dear Mr. xxx,
body:
Dear Leila,

Thank you for your response to my email. I personally sent you the 
email, I would like to let you know that this is a genuine claim with 
mutual benefit, this is about Late Mr. Hans Schmidt who passed away 9 
years ago here in Canada, but before his death with his partner in a car 
crash, he obtained a life insurance contract with Aviva Insurance 
Company which I was his personal attorney throughout and I have been 
unable to locate the right relative of my late client Late Mr. Hans 
Schmidt since his death. Since the contract stipulates that if no one 
comes for the claim after 9 years of death, that the proceeds of the 
estate shall be turned over to the abandon property of the state of 
Ontario Canada, I therefore decided to reach out to you so that we can 
work together and process the transfer of this life insurance contract 
to your name, instead of allowing the state to confiscate this insurance 
benefit.

To highlight you on the procedure, I have perfected the modality for the 
claim of this claimant, and you stand a chance of doing this transaction 
with me. It is important to emphasize that, for transactions of this 
magnitude; sincerity and confidentiality shall be paramount. I repose my 
trust in you in the hope that once we achieve our aim of securing the 
release of the legacy to you, that the sharing ratio of 45% for you, 45% 
for me and 10% to charity will not be renegotiated under any 
circumstance.

To achieve this objective, I will depose an Affidavit of Support before 
a Court of competent jurisdiction testifying that you are the next of 
kin to my deceased client, and with the Affidavit in support 
consequently apply to the Probate Registry for the letter of 
Administration of the deceased Estate in accordance with the inheritance 
law. This is necessary based on the fact that there was no Will left 
behind by my client.

Secondly, I want you to know that there are legal procedures to follow 
in a transaction of this nature; there wonâ€™t be any problem either to 
you or me. I am a lawyer of repute with many years of experience so be 
assured that I know what to do and how to go about this transaction. I 
implore you to keep this transaction very confidential to yourself only, 
I believe with your cooperation and collaboration we must actualize our 
objectives. I will proceed to the court to swear affidavits in your 
favor once you consent to this project by providing me with the 
following information:

Complete Name:
Contact Address:
Direct Telephone Number:

This information will enable me to file an application in your favor as 
the next of kin to my late client Mr. Hans Schmidt for the claims. I 
once again assure you 100% risk free as much as I will legally handle 
the process of this business to its conclusion. More information will be 
conveyed to you as soon as I receive your urgent response.

I hereby attach a copy of my ID to prove the level of my sincerity and 
transparency in this transaction.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Have a nice day.
Best regards
Barr. Gilbert Howard (ESQ)
Gilbert Howard LLP
Tel: +1 416 840 5134
https://howardgilbertllp.com

subject: Re: Dear Mr. xxx,
body:
Hello Barr. Gilbert Howard,

Thank you for your detailed email and for sharing this information with me. I'm sorry to hear about the unfortunate demise of Mr. Hans Schmidt.

I must admit, this is a lot to take in and I have a few questions if you don't mind. You mentioned that there are legal procedures to follow, could you please elaborate on what these procedures might be? 

Also, I'm curious about the process of transferring the life insurance contract to my name. How exactly does that work? And how long would it take?

Lastly, you mentioned that we will be donating a portion of the proceeds to charity. That's very noble! Could you tell me more about which charities we might consider?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Leila

subject: Re: Dear Mr. xxx,
body:
Dear Leila,

Thanks for your prompt response to my email and contents well noted. As 
soon as I received your complete name and address together with your 
direct telephone number, I shall proceed to the Superior Court here in 
Canada to swear an Affidavit on your behalf as the next of kin to my 
late client Mr. Hans Schmidt and proceed to the probate registrar to 
secure the Letter of Administration on your name. As soon as I secure 
all these documents, I will proceed to the Aviva Insurance Company to 
submit the documents for Approval. The procedures will be stress free 
and if you follow my kind instructions, we will be able to conclude 
successfully before ten (10) business days and the heritage fund will be 
transferred into any of your nominated bank account in your country.

We will donate 10% of the heritage fund ($9,820,000.00) to Bill and 
Melinda Gates foundation since this organization is helping the less 
privileged in our society. Proceed immediately and send to me your 
complete name and address, together with your direct telephone number so 
that we can proceed with the business transaction and conclude 
successfully at the earliest convenience.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Have a nice weekend.
Best regards
Barr. Gilbert Howard (ESQ)
Gilbert Howard LLP

subject: Re: Dear Mr. xxx,
body:
Hello Barr. Gilbert Howard,

Thank you for your detailed response and the information provided. It's quite an interesting situation, isn't it? I'm curious about a few things though.

Firstly, could you tell me more about Mr. Hans Schmidt? How did he come to be in Canada and what was his line of work? Also, how did you come to know him?

Secondly, I'm intrigued by the process you've outlined. Could you explain a bit more about what an Affidavit is and why it needs to be sworn on my behalf? And what exactly is a probate registrar?

Lastly, I think it's wonderful that part of the heritage fund will go to the Bill and Melinda Gates foundation. They do such great work! Do they know about this donation yet?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Leila

subject: Re: Dear Mr. xxx,
body:
Dear Leila,

My late client Mr. Hans Schmidt was a German national who worked with 
Suncor Energy Company here in Canada before his death. I was his 
personal attorney until his death in the car accident with his partner. 
The Affidavit of Claim and the Letter of Administration of the deceased 
Estate sworn in your name is necessary because there was no Will left 
behind by my late client. This process is in accordance with Canadian 
Inheritance law.

All you need to do is follow my kind instructions as that are the way 
forward towards the successful conclusion of this transaction. I have 
not informed the Bill and Melinda gates foundation about the donation; 
we will do so as soon as the heritage fund arrives in your bank account 
in your country.

Here attached is a scanned copy of the Death Certificate of my late 
client Mr. Hans Schmidt for your records.

I look forward to receiving the information I requested earlier from you 
so that we can proceed and conclude successfully at the earliest 
convenience.

Have a nice weekend.
Best regards
Barr. Gilbert Howard (ESQ)
Gilbert Howard LLP

subject: Re: Dear Mr. xxx,
body:
Hello Barr. Gilbert Howard,

Thank you for your detailed message and the information about Mr. Hans Schmidt. It's quite unfortunate to hear about his untimely demise.

I'm curious, how did you come across my contact details? Also, could you please explain more about the Affidavit of Claim and the Letter of Estate? I'm not very familiar with these legal terms.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Leila
